item.title: How do I edit the items that are sold in shops? Add/delete them?
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Didn’t you ask this like 2 days ago…

Goto the case where it adds the player xp. (For when they click it)

Add a if statement saying,

if (playerLevel[#] <= 98) {
add xp here;
}
else if (playerLevel[#] >= 99) {
addItem(cape, 1);
}

Now go through that and add the things you want, and make sure you put it under the right case.

Read full topic
